abstract: Foreign ministers of Germany, France, Russia and Ukraine urge fighters and mediators to withdraw weapons and land mines and prepare for local elections as cease-fire in eastern Ukraine continues to hold.
lead_paragraph: Buoyed somewhat by the relative success of a two-week-old cease-fire in eastern Ukraine, four foreign ministers urged fighters and mediators to withdraw weapons and remove land mines.

headline.main: Guarded Optimism as Cease-Fire Holds in East Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Guarded Optimism as Cease-Fire Holds in East Ukraine

snippet: Buoyed somewhat by the relative success of a two-week-old cease-fire in eastern Ukraine, four foreign ministers urged fighters and mediators to withdraw weapons and remove land mines.
